text:
August 16, 1967

Memorandum to

Mr. James L, Bauchat Mr. Cyril F. Hetsko
Mr. Alfred F. Bowden Mr, Everett Kovler

Ac. W, Elliot Brownlee Mr. Julien B, Mccarthy
Mr. James 3, Cunningham Mr. Eugene F, Mooney
Mr. Henry @. French Mr. John 8, Sparrow

Mr. Boone Gross Me. Silas B. Strickland
Mr, Virgil D. Hager Mr. Robert B. Walker
Nr, Robert K. Heimann Mr. Joseph R. Waterhouse

Mr. George H, Woodard

X am enclosing herewith for your information a copy of
a letter from Governor Heyner, the Administrator of the
Cigarette Advertising Code, to the menbers of the House
Commexce Committee which contains Governor Heyner’s
comments on the recent FTC report made pursuant to the
Pederal Cigarette Labeling and Advertising act.

 

old Henson

 

Attachment

Waterhouse Mr. Saint george H, Woodard X am enclosing herewith for your information a copy of a letter from Governor Heyner, the Administrator of the Cigarette Advertising Code, to the menbers of the House Commexce Committee which contains Governor Heyner ’ s comments on the recent FTC report made pursuant to the Pederal Cigarette Labeling and Advertising act. old Henson Attachment
summary: August 16, 1967. Memorandum to House Committee on Cigarette Labeling and Advertising. Governor Heyner’s comments on the recent FTC report made pursuant to the federal Cigarettes Labeled and advertising act. The Committee is enclosing herewith for your information a copy of. a letter from GovernorHeyner, the Administrator of the                Cigarette Advertising Code, to. the menbers of a House committee.
